instructions: Preheat the oven to 350F or 176C.
Add the cottage cheese to a blender.
Blend the cottage cheese until smooth.
Add the flour, salt, and baking soda to a medium bowl.
Whisk the dry ingredients until combined.
Add the softened butter, brown sugar, and white sugar to a large bowl.
Mix the butter and sugars until combined.
Add the vanilla extract and egg to the mixture.
Mix until fully combined.
Add the blended cottage cheese to the bowl.
Mix until combined.
Add the chocolate chips to the mixture.
Stir the chocolate chips into the dough.
Gradually add the flour mixture to the wet mixture.
Mix until a cookie dough forms.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
Scoop cookie dough onto the baking sheet, spacing them 2 inches apart.
Bake for 10 to 14 minutes until lightly golden brown.
Let cookies cool on the pan for 2 to 3 minutes.
Transfer cookies to a wire rack to cool completely.
Enjoy your cookies.
